message.content:
cs.DC, cs.CE, cs.SC, cs.NE, cs.Distributed Systems. 

The paper discusses a novel computational framework that connects Blue Waters, Open Science Grid, and the LIGO Data Grid to accelerate gravitational wave discovery. This involves configuring a LIGO Data Grid Tier-1 Center, containerizing LIGO's workflow software using Shifter, and utilizing Open Science Grid facilities. The paper also discusses the implications of this framework for a wider ecosystem of Higher Performance Computing users. Based on this information, the most likely arXiv CS sub-categories are cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing), cs.CE (Computational Engineering, Finance, and Science), cs.SC (Scientific Computing and Numerical Analysis), cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing), and cs.Distributed Systems.
